document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Maxwell update to the Court 
Date: Tue, 02 Feb 2021 20:26:28 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.02.02_AJN_Order Denying_Motion_to_Vacate_Order re_MDCJaptop_access.pdf 
All, 
Judge Nathan just issued the attached order denying the application to vacate her prior order regarding Maxwell's access 
to the laptop. 
Please let me know if there is a good time for a call tomorrow to discuss the update letter that is due this Friday. 
Thank you, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: 
Sent: Monday, February 1, 20217:44 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Maxwell update to the Court 
All, 
Attached please find a letter, which we just filed on ECF, informing the Court that although our office generally has no 
objection to Maxwell having additional laptop access, we defer to the MDC's judgment regarding how to manage its 
inmates, including in this situation. The defense has not filed a letter in response to your request to vacate the Court's 
prior order, but I will send you a copy if and when they do. 
Relatedly, our next update regarding Maxwell's conditions of confinement is due to the Court this Friday, February 
5th 
Per the attached order, we need to update Judge Nathan regarding the following topics: 
• Access to discovery (we have discussed this topic repeatedly, and my understanding is there are no material 
changes here, but we need to confirm) 
• Access to legal mail (confirming Maxwell is receiving her legal mail on the same basis as all other inmates) 
• Access to legal email (confirming that Maxwell has access to email with legal counsel via the BOP desktop 
computer) 
EFTA00028161

• Ability to communicate with legal counsel (confirming the frequency with which Maxwell receives legal calls and 
VTCs) 
• The frequency of searches of Maxwell (including all patdowns, mouth searches, ear searches, strip searches, 
body scans, cell searches, and nighttime monitoring) 
Is there a time in the next couple days when we could have a quick phone call to check in on these topics, please? 
Thanks very much, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
l  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00028162
